channel.title: Comments on: 5 Advanced Tips To Become Better At Age of Empires 2 Definitive
channel.description: Learn and Play Age Of Empires 2 Just Better

item.title: By: Oscar

item.description: The best part for me is "Building Your Rhythm", I think is very helpful for improve the hole performance in the game
item.content:encoded: The best part for me is “Building Your Rhythm”, I think is very helpful for improve the hole performance in the game

item.title: By: GregStein

I have uploaded the hotkeys to this site: https://aokhotkeys.appspot.com/presets/get/5152428951339008
So you can take a close look then manually change yours to match this preview.

item.title: By: Josema

item.description: Hey there! I am trying to install the hotkey config, but I don´t find the folder you specify in my Steam AoE2 DE folder, and the app doesn´t work for me either. What can I do?
item.content:encoded: Hey there! I am trying to install the hotkey config, but I don´t find the folder you specify in my Steam AoE2 DE folder, and the app doesn´t work for me either. What can I do?

item.title: By: GregStein
item.dc:creator: GregStein
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://ageofnotes.com/tutorials/5-advanced-tips-to-become-better-at-age-of-empires-2-definitive/#comment-426">Brian Van Mossevelde</a>.
The good news is you'll have x10 times fun than ever before and learn you way up to higher tier ELO. Good Luck friend <3
item.content:encoded: The good news is you’ll have x10 times fun than ever before and learn you way up to higher tier ELO. Good Luck friend <3

item.title: By: Brian Van Mossevelde
item.dc:creator: Brian Van Mossevelde
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://ageofnotes.com/tutorials/5-advanced-tips-to-become-better-at-age-of-empires-2-definitive/#comment-425">GregStein</a>.
Ok thats indeed alot. Will try =)

item.title: By: GregStein
item.dc:creator: GregStein
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://ageofnotes.com/tutorials/5-advanced-tips-to-become-better-at-age-of-empires-2-definitive/#comment-421">Brian Van Mossevelde</a>.
Hello,
What makes this game ultra hard to learn is the economic part. To get better at this game you must practice the economic part piece by piece or chunk by chunk. For example: 1- Practice all hotkeys first in scenario editor until you master them. 2- Practice scouting and finding 8 sheep, 2 boars before 6 mins (check my blog to see how to). 3- Practice the dark age eco until you click feudal age button which is 22 pop then repeat until you click around 8 mins. 4- Now practice to beat the hard ai and try to use all steps from above.
At this point you can read the rest of my blog posts and watch videos because you will understand everything so much easier.
item.content:encoded:
Hello,

What makes this game ultra hard to learn is the economic part. To get better at this game you must practice the economic part piece by piece or chunk by chunk. For example:
1- Practice all hotkeys first in scenario editor until you master them.
2- Practice scouting and finding 8 sheep, 2 boars before 6 mins (check my blog to see how to).
3- Practice the dark age eco until you click feudal age button which is 22 pop then repeat until you click around 8 mins.
4- Now practice to beat the hard ai and try to use all steps from above.

At this point you can read the rest of my blog posts and watch videos because you will understand everything so much easier.
